items.value: Bless the dead who died at its hand. Use the angel’s elixir on the demon’s main ingredient.
Link its past with the present and then you'll help it see what it really is. Use the wings of flies on any Beelzebub’s knife.
The chef's heart is in its tool, and that is also a missing element of the recipe. Put the amethyst in the filling.

Elena Kudelina(Vision Holder)
